typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		cdatetime as date,
		address as string,
		district as integer,
		beat as string,
		grid as long,
		crimedescr as string,
		code as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		Segment as string,
		Country as string,
		Product as string,
		{Discount Band} as string,
		{Units Sold} as double,
		{Manufacturing Price} as decimal(19,4),
		{Sale Price} as decimal(19,4),
		{Gross Sales} as decimal(19,4),
		Discounts as decimal(19,4),
		{ Sales} as decimal(19,4),
		COGS as decimal(19,4),
		Profit as decimal(19,4),
		Date as timestamp,
		{Month Number} as double,
		{Month Name} as string,
		Year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
